Parameter.name: Pcap Device
Parameter.Description: specify the network device which pcap should listen to

Parameter.name: Pcap Promiscuous Mode
Parameter.Description: specify if the pcap works on promiscuous mode. 0:no; 1:yes

Parameter.name: Pcap File's Directory and the prefix
Parameter.Description: specify the dumped file's directory and the prefix.

Parameter.name: Echo protocol Peer Address
Parameter.Description: specify the address which the protocol will connect to

Parameter.name: Echo Protocol Peer Port
Parameter.Description: specify the port which the protocol will connect to

Parameter.name: Echo Client Receive Buffer Size Power
Parameter.Description: specify the receive buffer size: power(2, echo.rpower).

Parameter.name: Echo Client Write Buffer Size Power
Parameter.Description: specify the write buffer size: power(2, echo.rpower).

Parameter.name: Echo Server Listen Address
Parameter.Description: specify the address which the protocol will listen to

Parameter.name: Echo Server Listen Port
Parameter.Description: specify the port which the protocol will listen to

Parameter.name: Echo Server Connection Receive Buffer Size Power
Parameter.Description: specify the receive buffer size: power(2, echo.rpower).

Parameter.name: Echo Server Connection Write Buffer Size Power
Parameter.Description: specify the write buffer size: power(2, echo.rpower).

Parameter.name: Net Processor Thread Number
Parameter.Description: specify the thread number for Net Processor/ThreadPool

Parameter.name: Fsm Processor Thread Number
Parameter.Description: specify the thread number for Fsm Processor/ThreadPool

Parameter.name: Log pattern
Parameter.Description: specify how to log a message. please refer to log4plus' manual.

Parameter.name: Log File Name
Parameter.Description: specify the file which will be logged to

Parameter.name: Log File Size
Parameter.Description: specify the max size(MB) for a single file.

Parameter.name: Log File No.
Parameter.Description: specify the max file number which the log files should keep.
